chapter.title: Design Overview
chapter.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; TCAP builds abstraction layer over protocol definition. It introduces simplified API in favor of JAIN TCAP

All interactions are handled by TCAP Dialog. Dialog agregates local and remote transactions into single reference.
